news_list.title: Congratulations to Dr. Dimple Bora on Successfully Completing Her Ph.D.
news_list.description: We are delighted to announce that Ms. Dimple Bora has successfully completed her Ph.D. Her dedication, hard work, and perseverance throughout this academic journey have been truly commendable. This remarkable achievement reflects her commitment to research excellence and academic growth. We extend our heartfelt congratulations to Dr. Dimple Bora and wish her continued success in all her future endeavors.
